mods.abstract: Invoice (No. 1552) for an order placed by R. J. Brady to cut scrap cardboard in the following sizes 15 3/4 x 28 7/8", 31 x 17 3/4", and 17 3/4 x 14 3/4". Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
